name: aPAWcalypse (ripplexiviour)
description:
People on earth find out that they all have simply been and experiment for the highest intelligent lifeforms in the galaxy when a capsule from outer space came to earth and caused a virus outbreak that turns people into superhuman mutants. The virus is a fog-like chemical that contaminates the human body when breathed in.

The main hero and their team have figured out that the only way to stop the virus is to go to the source of it. The hero decides that they are the only one fit enough to travel such a long distance since their teammates are recovering from injuries.

On the hero’s journey they find an animal that they save from dying and take it on their journey.

In order to carry on their journey the hero must defeat mutant enemies.
